name: Detective Lin: Time Murder Frenzy
storyline: Tomah, a retired track and field athlete, was found dead in the janitor's room of the company he used to work at. His friend and co-worker, Lin, receives an unsettling message from Tomah the day of his death. Having bowed to renounce detective work forever, Lin struggles as he tries to decide what to do about his friend’s sudden death.
summary: A narrative click and point game where you gather information from the past to solve the murder of your best friend.
